title: Will i still be able to get Challenger Ahri?
body:
Im leaving for a 7-10 day holiday tomorrow morning (the day of patch 5.1) and will be without any means to buy the Ahri skin 
because its the first skin of its kind (season skin but at the beginning) i don't know what is required to get it or how long it will be available for.
will it still be available after my holiday or will have to miss out on it?
thanks

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Justify,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=tAgiakz5,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-01-14T04:24:44.425+0000)
>
> That moment when a bronze 5 Ahri wants a challenger skin. 
> How do I know it is a bronze 5? well he is level 10 and getting destroyed :D
> http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Lord+Sesshomaru

forgot you need to be pro gamer to get skins, sorry sir
damn right, glad some people still have common sense built into them.
This is my smurf account, and i made one of my friends play on it from lvl 6 up to see if he liked the game
I'm still bronze tho haha but b1 not b5
Thank you, I'm happy that I won't miss out :)
Worst comes to worse, I'll gift it to you, but you owe me. =P

Just saw that the skin is here till feb 2nd so I'll be back by then
So I won't need to take you up on your generous offer, thanks anyway Tho :)

You are a great guy haha, hopefully it doesn't come to that tho, if it does comes to that ill tell you cos ill have my iPad and can access the forums, and i sure would owe you hahaha xD. But its very unlikely haha with luck its still here when i get back, thanks for the thought tho its great that there are ppl like you out there that would help a stranger :)

Challenger Ahri Skin
975 RP / Upcoming skin
its legacy tho so it will only be available for a short time
Probably going to be available for more that 7-10 days though
hopefully i just wasn't sure cos of it being a new line of skins
